Uses of Package
org.objectstyle.cayenne.access.trans

Packages that use org.objectstyle.cayenne.access.trans
org.objectstyle.cayenne.access Contains core Cayenne container classes. 
org.objectstyle.cayenne.access.trans Provides translators for Cayenne queries. 
org.objectstyle.cayenne.dba Provides default implementation of DbAdapter architecture. 
org.objectstyle.cayenne.dba.db2 DbAdapter implementation for IBM DB2 RDBMS. 
org.objectstyle.cayenne.dba.openbase DbAdapter implementation for OpenBase RDBMS. 
org.objectstyle.cayenne.dba.oracle DbAdapter implementation for Oracle RDBMS. 
org.objectstyle.cayenne.dba.postgres DbAdapter implementation for PostgeSQL RDBMS. 
org.objectstyle.cayenne.dba.sqlserver
